forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11am and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
